column4: I installed my Grub Loader with windows partition and now I want to reformat my Windows. What should I do to preserve my Grub Loader?
I try once where I install Grub with my Linux partition and I reformat my Windows. After finish everything, it just boot into windows without Grub loader
also a good idea just in case to keep a backup of your /boot/grub on a thumbdrive or something.. can always fix it with a live cd
